:'''Traveler:''' Hmm, the background colors feel a little off.

:'''Albedo:''' Don't worry. The value of a painting is its ability to capture a special moment in time. Just go with your instincts.

:'''Albedo:''' It's alright. I'm taking the time to make some records as well.
